reviewText: Greg Lapin and Destin Mounts are both very smoot, proficient shooters and this video shows some interesting insights you can learn from students under pressure in force on force engagements. This is a critical aspect of firearms training that you can't pay too much attention to.

Learn from other people's mistakes, you don't have time to make them all yourself.
This series is for those who know they need training but don't have the time or money to attend force on force training.
This series created a new acronym INTOT.
I Never Thought Of That.
Great series. Makes you look at your own gear, habits, and routine and maybe make some adjustments.

I really enjoyed this series.  My daughter and I would binge watch.  The conversations that they sparked helped develop greater insight in both of us.

The production quality is high and the demonstrations were top notch.

Can't wait for season 3!
This is an awesome series.  The video quality is excellent.  Just watching the videos opens your eyes to potential threats.
